alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 3:11AM CST until January 28 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Knox and Cedar Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
